backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the all-columns search feature and related files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-written summaries for various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining warm coral color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling file upload, spreadsheet parsing, search execution, and result display.
frontend/src/components/ResultsList.tsx: Displays matching spreadsheet rows with column/value pairs and scrollable layout.
frontend/src/components/SearchControls.t: Search form allowing column selection (including all-columns), value input, and match mode toggle.
frontend/src/components/SpreadsheetUploa: Spreadsheet upload component supporting CSV/XLSX files with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor instance with authentication-aware caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider managing Internet Identity login state, loading stored identities, and exposing login/clear utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/spreadsheet/parseSpread: Parses CSV and XLSX files in-browser, generating columns, normalizing cell values, and returning structured row data.
frontend/src/lib/spreadsheet/search.ts: Implements exact and contains search across one or all spreadsheet columns.
frontend/src/lib/spreadsheet/types.ts: Type definitions for spreadsheet columns, rows, parsed results, errors, and search modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements, implemented features, and current state.
